topic.title: [ERROR] Content sign failed: invalid private key.
topic.body: I was playing ZeroBird ( http://127.0.0.1:43110/16nsEmQ1ErcdNRpe7zmSg5eF2Y1zQpuURp/ ) everything was ok, but suddenly after a lot of replays now I get the error "Content sign failed: invalid private key." instead of "Content published to 5 peers". Anyone knows what it means?

topic.title: Goodbye Person of Interest - Blog Post

1_1BYU9zV786auJ29dF3HMAQYhxA2WgN4ofi.body:
> [nofish](#comment_490_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): You have played too much :)The site owner should raise the space limit per user (10k), because you are over it.

Thanks! XD

4_1EMpuiFM1NLZmAVyoAWnwi8VwiZVV4dcnN.body: Hi, please raise the space limit per user (10k), because after about 50 replays the game responds "Content sign failed: invalid private key." and the scores are not saved anymore.

1_1Ax5yj36bQDizcaeCMn9upKzVVyQ4wsm48.body:
> [bukaking](#comment_14_17n5jg4bBEoWodXDf8L4Y2u88ShagS272Y): They will likely flood ZeroNet with antisemitism and racism and then on CNN/FoxNews say how ZeroNet is den for hate speech and that ZeroNet must be banned/regulated.

The good news is apparently is only 1 or 2 trolls posting many messages :)
